attributes.action: reduce road tax on older vehicles for environmental reasons.
attributes.action_prefix: We the undersigned petition the Prime Minister to
attributes.background: The largest ammount of energy used in a vehicles lifetime is at the point of manufacture.On this basis buying a new car is potentially more damaging than using an older vehicle that is in good condition.What I propose is that these drivers should be rewarded by reduced tax rates.I would suggest that the cut off point would be the rates prior to the emission bands.
